question: iam a nursing student embarking on an essay re. diabetes & how it affects your life,i would be most greatful if i could ask questions about type 1 diabets.1.how has it affected your life,(social, job etc)2.psycological3. hospitalisation-if any & why? any difficulties whilst admitteddid you meet any other health care professionals,how did they help?
title: how diabetes effects your life
